name: Athletic Gymnast - Sporty Art
description:
Athletic Gymnast is an IMPROVED version of a multi-level sports game. It includes different modes, new options and types of control.

Help Daisy to balance on the beam as long as possible and do many other tricks!

2 MODES:
- training
- competition

3 TYPES OF SPORTS GEAR:
- balance beam
- gymnastic rings
- chin-up bar

KEY FEATURES:
- timing and playing against the clock
- opportunity to visit championships worldwide
- upgrading your gymnast's skills and looks.

If you have always wanted to be a gymnast, why not use the chance now? With Athletic Gymnast you can win the contest and become a champion in gymnastics!
